net.pandoragames.far.ui

Class FARConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.pandoragames.far.ui.FARConfig
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    SwingConfig

    public class FARConfig
extends java.lang.Object
    Data container for configuration values.
    Author:
    Olivier Wehner

    • Method Detail

      • getEffectiveJavaVersion

        public static int getEffectiveJavaVersion()
        Returns the "effective" java version, i.e. the "minor" verision returned by the system property "java version". Returns 4 for java 1.4.x, 5 for java 1.5.x and so on. Returns 0 (zero) if the System property "java.version" could not be parsed.
        Returns:
        "effective" java version as a positive integer

      • isProcessBinary

        public boolean isProcessBinary()
        If this flag is set to true, binary files will be processed in replace operations like any others. Otherwise binary files will be treated as read only if it comes to replace operations.
        Returns:
        true if binary files should be processed in replace operations

      • setProcessBinary

        public void setProcessBinary(boolean processBinary)
        Sets the process binary files flag.
        Parameters:
        processBinary - true if binary files should be processed in replace operations

      • loadFromProperties

        protected void loadFromProperties(java.util.Properties properties)
        Loads the base and the backupd directory from a Properties object. The property names are defined as constants of this class. The property values are supposed to be valid pathes, but both directories are controlled for existance. Inheriting classes may overwrite this method to load additional properties.
        Parameters:
        properties - holding properties for base and backup directory.

      • writeToProperties

        protected void writeToProperties(java.util.Properties properties)
        The inverse operation to loadFromProperties().
        Parameters:
        properties - where to write base and backup directory to

      • setPatternList
